concept.title: Required Equipment
concept.shortdesc: This entry describes all of the equipment required for the recalibration of an M800 meter.

conbody.p: All of the equipment is stored in the Technical Services laboratory for technicians to use. Have the following equipment ready at the calibration station before starting:

ul.li: Screwdriver with flat head, less than 1mm wide
Power cord with tinned leads (if needed)

li.p: Hewlett-Packard 33401A multimeter or equivalent with banana plug leads, red and black
The multimeter must have a current calibration sticker.
The verifier kit must have a current calibration sticker.

ul.li: M800 patch cord, part number 52080271 OR 58080272
770MAX equipped with 10-inch power leads and an additional 10-inch jumper wire (for cleaning mechanical relays, if needed
